d=[0,1,4,3,8,5,2,7,6,9]
t=input()
def e(n):
    r=0
    while n:
        if n%2==0:
            r+=2*(n%10)
        else:
            r+=n%10
        n=n/10
    return r%10
def f(n):
    r=0
    while n%10:
        n-=1
        r+=e(n)
    return r+45*(n/10)
for _ in xrange(t):
    a,b=map(int,raw_input().split())

    print f(b+1)-f(a)
